page.title: 09Housing
page.content: {Kilbarchan}started over{300}years ago as a very small village with only a few houses on the main street.These were{Weavers houses.}Some houses in Kilbarchan are very like the{Weavers {Cottage built in 1723.}Kilbarchan is a conservation village and many houses can not be knocked down or altered thus preserving the character of the village.In the{1930's}the council- built{Wheatlands,}was erected to house Kilbarchan's increasing population.In more recent times modern estates of detached and semi-detached houses have been built at{Fulton Cres,Langside, {Tandlehill Rd,Park Gdns,Taylor Avenue {and Burnside Gardens.}The first homes in Brookfield were built in{1897}as a "Backwater for Businessmen" Brookfield is formed of semi and detached houses which are all owner occupied. { }
